column6: Goliath!  The Wasp!  Hawkeye!  The Black Panther!  The Vision!  They are... Earth's Mightiest Heroes?!  Beginning a second look into the history of the Avengers in this all-new mini-series written by original EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES scribe, Joe Casey.  A new team has risen to supplant the original legends -- and these members have to prove their worth all over again.  Can Goliath withstand the pressures of lead
column8: | writer:Joe Casey | penciller (cover):Dave Johnson | inker:Tom Palmer | colorist:Wil Quintana | penciller:William Rosado | letterer:Richard Starkings
